entry.title: Metalsmith's downsides
entry.summary: I'm using Metalsmith to generate this site and, while I generally like it, it's not perfect. Here are some of Metalsmith's downsides.

entry.title: Generating SVG diagrams automatically with Metalsmith
entry.summary: Metalsmith is used to build this static site. Here's how Graphviz was integrated to automatically generate diagrams.

entry.title: Compiling Graphviz to WebAssembly (without Emscripten)
entry.summary: In order to automatically generate diagrams for my site that's built with Node, I compiled Graphviz to WebAssembly. Here's my experience.

entry.title: WebAssembly objects, libraries, and linking (for C code)
entry.summary: In order to reuse C libraries in WebAssembly, here is how object files, libraries, and linking work with Clang and LLVM.

entry.title: Passing strings to and from WebAssembly using C
entry.summary: Here's an example of passing strings to and from a WebAssembly module that is written in C and compiled with Clang and LLVM.
